name: yandex-translate-in-context
title: Yandex translate - from anything to Russian (or from Russian to English)
description: Translate selected word or phrase over translate.yandex.ru from any lang to Russian (or from Russian to English) - result in context menu (right click), tooltip (move the mouse over the context menu item) and in popup - if Firefox not in fullscreen. If a pop-up window disappears before you have time to read it - just hover your mouse over the pop-up window - and it will not disappear until you remove the mouse. Minimum and fast - without hotkeys and option screen. Not affect DOM. Unofficial extension - works using official API. Source code at https://github.com/vitaly-zdanevich/extension-firefox-yandex-translate
author: Vitaly Zdanevich
